summary: Ambitious and progressive Commercial Manager with a project, commercial and business development background. I have delivered value-adding strategic approaches to the Oil, Gas and Renewable markets leveraging extensive technical skills to tailor business-client relations, contract award and project delivery. Demonstrating considerable strength from lead generation through to client on-boarding, strategic partnerships, account management and account growth, I deliver a commercial edge and drive to achieving significant revenue returns within commercial and project environments. A strong negotiator, influencer and senior level presenter, I have achieved business connectivity with board-level external stakeholders and lead commercial and project delivery to successful results.
